name: gifster
tagline: An image bookmarking tool for chrome.
body:
![gifster banner](https://i7.minus.com/ibkoEK838tuSXg.png)

# Use gifster to easily bookmark and share your favourite images on the web.

## Bookmarking images
When you install gifster, you'll be able to save images that you see on the web to your personal library. This is done by right-clicking them, and selecting the gifster option "Bookmark image".

## Browsing, managing, and sharing images
When you click on a textfield you will be able to select the gifster option "Insert image". By clicking this you'll be able to view your image library through gifster's UI. You can remove images by clicking the trash can, or paste a link into the textfield by clicking the green checkmark.



### Notice:
gifster requires access to your data on websites, tabs and browsing activity, but gifster does NOT have adware, malware, or spyware, and does NOT collect or use your data.

### Disclaimer:
This extension uses Google Analytics to collect extension usage statistics to help improve user experience. If you want to opt-out of Google Analytics tracking, please visit http://tools.google.com/dlpage/gaoptout
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
